title: O, My Child Come Home Again

tokens.lyric: O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home.

lines.raw: [G]O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home.

tokens.lyric: Though your sin be deep and dark, and your burden hard to bear,

lines.raw: [A7]Though your sin be deep and dark, and your burden hard to bear,

tokens.lyric: Still the Lord of all will forgive you,

lines.raw: [D7]Still the Lord of all will forgive you,

tokens.lyric: And accept you in His grace.
For the heart of God is deep and wide,

lines.raw: [D7]For the heart of God is deep and wide,

tokens.lyric: O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home.

lines.raw: [C]O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home.

tokens.lyric: How He searches every day, for the children of His heart.

lines.raw: [G]How He searches every day, for the children of His heart.

tokens.lyric: Every night the Lord leaves the doorway

lines.raw: [D7]Every night the Lord leaves the doorway

tokens.lyric: And He longs for them to come back home,

lines.raw: [Am]And He longs for them to come back home,

tokens.lyric: All the ones who left Him behind.

lines.raw: [D7]All the ones who left Him behind.

tokens.lyric: O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home,

lines.raw: [G]O my child, come home again; How I beg you to come home,

tokens.lyric: Though the whip has stung your back, in the tender hands of God,

lines.raw: [A7]Though the whip has stung your back, in the tender hands of God,

tokens.lyric: All your suffering path can be lightened,

lines.raw: [D7]All your suffering path can be lightened,

tokens.lyric: And the Lord can ease your pain,

lines.raw: [G]And the Lord can ease your pain,

tokens.lyric: Come and rest within the Father's heart,

lines.raw: [C]Come and rest within the Father's heart,

tokens.lyric: O my children quickly come home.
